title: Nov 18, 2017 - NA Login Issues
body:
Hi friends,

NA is currently having issues for some players trying to reach the authentication server to log in.  We currently have a [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page for updates.  Hang tight!

replies.body: Has the issue, as far as you are aware, been fixed? I can't even get authenticated on the support page to submit a ticket, and I suspect I can only log in on the website because I have it set to remember me at all times.
